RSC.RSC_CD_NAME, RSC.RSC_CD_UNIT
FROM BF_RSC_ORDER_DETAILS DTS LEFT JOIN BF_RSC_ORDER OD ON DTS.RSC_ORDER_CODE = OD.RSC_ORDER_CODE LEFT JOIN BF_CMN_RSC_CODE RSC ON DTS.RSC_CD_CODE = RSC.RSC_CD_CODE
RSC_ORDER_VOL != RSC_ORDER_ARV
AND DTS.RSC_ORDER_CODE LIKE '%' || #{rscOrderCode} || '%'
AND OD.RSC_ORDER_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{rscOrderTitle} || '%'
AND TO_CHAR(OD.RSC_ORDER_DATE, 'yyyy-MM-dd') = #{rscOrderDate}
ORDER BY DTS.RSC_ORDER_DTL_NO

RSCCODE.RSC_CD_NAME, RSCCODE.RSC_CD_UNIT,
